subtree.speaker: Oracle
subtree.line: I hail from the Tower of Oracles. This is the first time I have traversed the realm of dreams.

subtree.speaker: Statue
subtree.line: Oh, so you are a walker?

subtree.speaker: Oracle
subtree.line: Indeed. It is my charge to protect the life of our King. One of our knights was poisoned by wine intended for the king.

subtree.speaker: Statue
subtree.line: It would seem that there is scandal at the court.

subtree.speaker: Oracle
subtree.line: It is my charge to protect the life of our King. Do you have the answers I seek?

subtree.speaker: Gaurdian
subtree.line: I might indeed. I am the guardian appointed to this part of the abyss. I hold in my mind the whims and fears of all those present in the royal court.

subtree.speaker: Oracle
subtree.line: Truly? Then please, who is behind this foul plot?

subtree.speaker: Oracle
subtree.line: Not worthy...? What would make me worthy.

subtree.speaker: Guardian
subtree.line: The minds of others are not privy to any mortal lest they prove to me that they can beat my game.

subtree.speaker: Guardian
subtree.line: The minds of others are not privy to any mortal lest they prove to me that they can beat my game.

choices.speaker: Guardian
choices.line: A simple game. You must answers my riddles.

choices.speaker: Guardian
choices.line: Indeed. I will take you there too.

choices.speaker: Guardian
choices.line: Strike me down with your staff and you will see.

choices.speaker: Oracle
choices.line: I have no time for games.

choices.speaker: Guardian
choices.line: You will play my games lest you wish to rot in this realm for all eternity.

choices.speaker: Oracle
choices.line: Fine. What would you have me do?

choices.speaker: Guardian
choices.line: Strike me down with your staff and you will see.

choices.speaker: Oracle
choices.line: You will not stand in my way.

choices.speaker: Guardian
choices.line: And how do you suppose to do so?

choices.speaker: Oracle
choices.line: By striking you down where you stand.

choices.speaker: Guardian
choices.line: Foolish mortals. Strike me down and see how that might help you.

choices.speaker: Guardian
choices.line: Your staff holds no dominion over me.
